title: kapAli irukka
sahitya:
kapAli irukka vIN kalakkamEn unakku kalpakAmbikai nAthan kAma samhAranAm


anupallavi

  pApa vinai thIrttaruLum parama karuNAnidhi
 bhaktha paripAlakan paramEshvaranum Ana


caraNam    mayil vAhan gaNapatiyum malaimagaL karpaka annaiyum
maittunan mAdhavanOd-arubattu mUvarum toDara
kayilai viTTu mayilai vanda karuNai onrE pOdAdO
kalai magaLum tirumagaLum kalandu vAzh tirumayilaik-
